long_description: The Pacsafe RFIDtec 50 bi-fold wallet can protect your essential cards and documents from opportunistic RFID thieves. RFID-reader-blocking pocket prevents access to your personal data stored on micro chips in your passport and credit cards. The Pacsafe RFIDtec 50 wallet includes a transparent ID card slot, a compartment for cash, 2 slip pockets, 2 credit-card slots and 1 outer slip pocket.
short_description: The Pacsafe RFIDtec 50 bi-fold wallet can protect your essential cards and documents from opportunistic RFID thieves.
